name: The Still Palace
description:
In The Still Palace the player will take the role of an explorer forced to venture into a very particular building that makes no sense neither in space nor in time, in which he will unravel the story of three people who for one reason or another have disappeared in a mysterious way.

The first person the player will learn about will be a married Guard who lost his wife to one of the prison inmates who managed to escape and found his way to the wife killing her.

The second person the player will learn about will be a secret investigator who gave up on his job and decided to become a journalist as a side job, still keeping track of all the cases he was investigating, even the murder of the Guard’s wife or the crazy artist.

The last story will be the one of a crazy artist who murdered his daughter to create the perfect painting using part of her, while exploring the level the player will come across all the failed paintings of the artist.

FEATURES LIST:

  • Puzzle solving
  • Movable objects
  • Storyline
  • Environmental storytelling 
  • Collectables
  • Minimal Graphics
